snippet.title: Guards II: Chaos in Hell — Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now — https://store.steampowered.com/app/2958570/Guards_II_Chaos_in_Hell 

Guards II: Chaos in Hell is an easy-to-learn hard-to-master tactic dungeon crawler with a tricky gameplay loop. Defend three lines, swap two of your characters to make your move, plan your strategy turns ahead, and get the most out of the party combinations and characters' abilities.
